dataList.dlg: I'm Sinclair... Emil, Sinclair. Oh, my number is, uhm...eleven.
Good morning! Did you have a good... Oh, you can sleep, right, manager...?
I feel the most comfortable at this time of the day. Have a nice afternoon, manager.
How was your day? As for me... I couldn't really focus on my task, I think.
I don't think I could ever have imagined doing this... Oh, it's not that I don't like my job or anything, it's just... something that occurred to me.
You really are amazing, manager... I'm still struggling to adjust, and you're leading us like a pro despite the memory loss.
Look, Rodya gave me snacks. I'm gonna save some for later. Hehe.
Say, Dante... Do you...really feel nothing having that for your head? Is the world...still normal to you?
So, if you don't remember your past, I guess that means you don't have regrets either, right, Dante? It might be rude of me to say this, but... I envy that. You get to wholly focus on the present.
Um, manager...? Where are you? Are you busy?
Umm... Me? Mmm... I will do my best...
I guess this is for the best, right...?
Did I do something wrong...?
I'll try...!
I did it, right...?
Ngh...!
I did it!
Will that happen to me, too...?
Thank goodness I made it...
It's all my fault...
Umm... Did we make it? I'm relieved.
I don't really think it's thanks to me. I appreciate the compliment, though. I was reminded of my mother for a moment.
Sorry. I should've done better... I still have much room for improvement.
